q: coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called" adult supervision" for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,

Also for the first time, Microsoft says it is making the cloud-based edition of the software available before the on-premise, server-based version, which will come out in late February. That really reflects the push Microsoft is making into the cloud, Steve Ballmer said during an online launch event on Thursday. Microsoft's not the only one gunning for the cloud. He said: I never really had a proper education. I wasn't born with any skill. I didn't learn anything from school." Mainly, I trust my instincts because I have very broad tastes."
